_header: Tidings true told there is true
_description: A Christmas carol — two quatrains (abba) with refrain, ‘Blessed be Jhesu’ and 4-line burden: ‘Tydynges trew ther buthe come newe / Blessed be Jhesu’ (repeated)

BLAdd5665.First Lines:
Tydynges trew tolde ther ys treweJesu to be born of a
                    mayde…
BLAdd5665.Last Lines: …To all þat leuen aryghthBlessed be Jhesu
